adHeader: Cash For Your Property | Any Condition - Location | Top Dollar Paid
adDetails: We specialize in purchasing property in the Bay Area for cash, close very quickly, and with no contingencies. We are extremely discreet and professional. We prefer single-family homes, but we buy condos, buildable lots, apartments, and office buildings. We also can offer the seller/occupant a rent-back situation, if they need to stay in the property. Any scenario and circumstance considered Again- * We pay top-dollar for your property * We pay all-cash * ABSOLUTELY AS-IS SALE - ANY CONDITION * No repairs, cleaning, painting, hauling, etc. required by you * We close in 5 days or sooner, no contingencies * We offer the seller/occupant a rent-back if needed * Any situation considered - Divorce | Family Trust |Bankruptcy | Short Sale | Foreclosure |Distress Sale * All property types - Single Family | Condos & Town homes | Lots | Apartments | Office
